text.section:
This section does not apply to a citation:
for a violation of a parking ordinance or regulation adopted under Title 26, Subtitle 3 of the Transportation Article;
adopted by the Chief Judge of the District Court under § 1-605(d) of the Courts Article, for use in traffic offenses; or
issued by a Natural Resources police officer under § 1-205 of the Natural Resources Article.
A bench warrant may be issued for the arrest of a defendant who fails to appear in court in response to a citation.
A person who fails to appear in court in response to a citation is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 90 days or both.
